structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.catch_line: Sales or exchanges among distributors not restricted.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 250.361 to 250.451 shall be construed to restrict or avoid sales or exchanges of fertilizers to each other by distributors who mix fertilizer materials for sale, or prevent the free and unrestricted shipments of fertilizer to distributors who have registered their brands or are licensed as required by provisions of KRS 250.361 to 250.451.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 19, effective July 13, 1984.
